# cursorly-spinner



<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property | Attribute | Description                                                         | Type     | Default     |
| -------- | --------- | ------------------------------------------------------------------- | -------- | ----------- |
| `size`   | `size`    | Size of the spinner. Only values supported are 'regular' or 'large' | `string` | `'regular'` |
